name: RedBidd: A Colorful Revival
description:
RedBidd..? Revival? What's that?

Glad you asked! RedBidd: A Colorful Revival is a complete remake of the original "RedBidd: A Squared Madness" made by swackyGCF in GameMaker: Studio. The entire game has been made in the span of a month. Many bugs have been encountered and different mechanics have been introduced throughout the development. And now the game is ready to enter a playable state.

 So what's the game about?

You play as RedBidd, a red rabbit who enjoys spending time with his friend Wraps playing video games. But uh-oh! A lighting beam has struck the land and made it lose all color. Now it's RedBidd's mission to find out what's going on.

Features this game has (that are present in pretty much any other game):

  • Gamepad support!
  • Lovable characters (Who doesn't love TipBox?  )
  • Dangerous obstacles!
  • And a full-fledged boss battle! (I wonder who we fight against?)
Reminder that this is a demo version. That means you may encounter some glitches here and there. If you found some, please tell me in the comments!

Thanks to https://mint-water.itch.io/ for providing a high quality logo you see on the thumbnail
